testcase.classname: Verify the Diagnostic Screen for M262 PLC
testcase.name: Launch the Industrial Mobile Device and update the credentials under M262 PLC
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the Application and do accept and agree........................passed When Click on plus button under home screen of Industrial Device............passed Then Click on Select product option on the connection popup.................passed Then Click On PLC...........................................................passed And Click On M262...........................................................passed And Click On TM262M25MESS8T.................................................passed Then Click on the Cancel button at the top-left.............................passed Then Click on the Diagnostic tile under M262 Dashboard......................passed
